data.description: Query google pagerank of a web page
data.communities: Not yet discussed (but i will discuss it on perl#irc.perl.org)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Because many webmasters need module for querying Google Page rank.
    Last time there are many paid scripts which doing this, so I wanted
    to make a free one.

    I've been searching through CPAN for such module (by keywords
    pagerank) but did not found.

    I've choosed Google namspace because module is for querying
    "Google". And Google::PageRank because it queries PageRank.
